message: 4:35 I don't get it. Wouldn't Ichikawa be in furiten now, and thus not able to call Ron?

regarding the furiten rule, one is the player cannot ron on tiles that they have dealt before
and for the second is that they are not allowed to call ron if they passed the tiles within the same turn. So in this case, ichikawa skipped the ron, got to his turn, dealt another tile and then called ron.
